title.narrative: Fournir des repas scolaires utilisant la production locale aux enfants d’âge scolaire et aider les institutions nationales à élaborer une politique nationale de repas scolaires utilisant la production locale et des programmes de protection sociale

sector.narrative: By 2030, end hunger and ensure access by all people, in particular the poor and people in vulnerable situations, including infants, to safe, nutritious and sufficient food all year round
